snippet.title: FRENZIES ANNOUNCE TRAILER | nDREAMS | META QUEST & PS VR2
snippet.description:
Welcome to FRENZIES, the next best shooter in VR. 

This is the chaotic PvP shooter for the ultimate show-off, combining nDreams’ precision gunplay with a lucky dip of frantic round types. 

Step into the neon-drenched arenas and be ready to conquer the chaos. Customise your onesie and choose your weaponry for the perfect combination of deadly skill and killer style! 

Zip, dash, sprint, blast and gloat your way to glory across a series randomised solo and team-based rounds. 

Friend or foe, it doesn't matter. At the end of the day, its all about you. And there can only be one winner. 

FRENZIES will be in Closed Alpha from Thursday 18 July. Sign-up on the official Discord to apply to be a playtester: discord.gg/frenziesvr

Follow FRENZIES on X @frenziesvr
